document.full_text: when their club was lured away by the town of milton keynes in 2002, wimbledon fans founded a new one and got right to work climbing england's soccer ladder.
document.title: on soccer: in city that lost its team, every win is a point of pride
lines_and_colors: when their club was lured away by the town of milton keynes in 2002, wimbledon fans founded a new one and got right to work climbing england's soccer ladder.
